name: Immersive Training & Networking for Digital Marketers
content: Join hundreds of your fellow marketers in Kansas City for the upcoming Digital Summit on May 15-16! Experience two days of invaluable digital marketing tactics, best practices, and insights impacting your current strategy. Choose from 25+ sessions led by the industry's leading experts on topics like SEO, Data & Analytics, Social Media, Email, AI, Branding and much more!
